synopsis.text: He avily engrossed in the free-to-play game "Naka no Hito Genome," high schooler and renowned live streamer Akatsuki Iride finds himself and seven other streamers transported into the game's universe. The once-fictional world now becomes a perilous reality as they must face treacherous challenges and battle monstrous creatures. Their survival hinges on achieving 100 million clicks on the live stream documenting their struggles. As the line between game and reality blurs, will these eight individuals ever return to their normal lives?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
